item.vc_gliders.copper_upgrade.descripti: An upgrade kit used in an Anvil to make your Glider lightning resistant.
item.vc_gliders.nether_upgrade.descripti: An upgrade kit used in an Anvil to make your Glider Nether resistant.
item.vc_gliders.paraglider_diamond.descr: A durable glider that will slow your fall. Gain height from hot blocks!
item.vc_gliders.paraglider_gold.descript: A glider that will slow your fall. Gain height from hot blocks!
item.vc_gliders.paraglider_iron.descript: A glider that will slow your fall. Gain height from hot blocks!
item.vc_gliders.paraglider_netherite.des: A glider that will slow your fall. Gain height from hot blocks!
item.vc_gliders.reinforced_paper.descrip: A crafting ingredient and repair material for Wooden Paragliders.
item.vc_gliders.reinforced_paper_diamond: A crafting ingredient and repair material for Wooden Paragliders.
item.vc_gliders.reinforced_paper_gold.de: A crafting ingredient and repair material for Golden Paragliders.
item.vc_gliders.reinforced_paper_iron.de: A crafting ingredient and repair material for Iron Paragliders.
item.vc_gliders.reinforced_paper_netheri: A crafting ingredient and repair material for Netherite Paragliders.
